different_game_choices.now_you_can_observe: Now you can choose the players you will observe in the following rounds in this game.

different_game_intro.different_version: Now, we will play a different version of the game.
different_game_intro.instead_of: Instead of assigning you the peers you observe randomly, we will let you choose the players you observe.

final_score.ask_your_teachers: Ask your teachers about getting your reward!
final_score.you_guessed_correctly: You guessed correctly in {X} games, and earned {x} points, which means you made extra.

game_first_round.guess_color: Guess the color of the bag:
game_first_round.the_computer_chose: The computer chose a bag and split the balls randomly to each player.

game_other_rounds.see_what_others_guessed: See what some other players guessed in the last round:
game_other_rounds.your_guess_was_blue: Your guess in the last round was BLUE.
game_other_rounds.your_guess_was_red: Your guess in the last round was RED.

game_results.the_computer_chose_blue: The computer chose the BLUE bag.
game_results.the_computer_chose_red: The computer chose the RED bag.

game_video.feel_free: Feel free to watch the video again to remind yourself of the rules.

intro_practice.now_you_will_play: Now you will play 2 practice games to get used to the rules.
intro_practice.since_these_rules: Since these are practice rounds, we will not reward anyone for their performance.

quiz_balls.colors_in_bag: What colors are the balls in the blue bag?

quiz_colors.instructions: To win, you have to pick the bag the computer chose. What colors are the bags the computer chooses?
quiz_colors.question: Question

quiz_peers.one_ball_all_peers: One ball and all peers' guesses.
quiz_peers.one_ball_few_peers: One ball and a few peers' guesses.
quiz_peers.what_will_you_observe: What will you observe to help you learn which bag the computer chose?

ready_to_play.get_ready: Get ready to play Red or Blue!

real_game_intro.added_points: {X} points will be added to your final reward.
real_game_intro.get_ready: Get ready to win and earn money!
real_game_intro.if_you_win: If you win in this game, {X} points will be added to your score and final reward.
real_game_intro.now_we_practiced: Now that we practiced, we will play the real games.

rules_screen.instructions: You can replay the video as many times as you want. Not knowing the rules lowers your chances of winning. Ask your teacher if you have any questions about the game.

survey.before_we_are_done: Before we are done, we want to ask you a few short questions about how you played today.
